channel.title: NotchNest's Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.1.0 - Thanks for downloading NotchNest.
item.description:
Thanks for downloading NotchNest.

Here’s what’s new in Version 1.1.0:

  • New Clipboard Manager – Access your clipboard history directly from the notch, with options to highlight, search, and pin important items for quick reuse.
  • Performance improvements and UI refinements for a smoother notch experience.

    • Your support means a lot, and early feedback helps us improve faster.

    As always, if you run into any issues or have suggestions, feel free to reach out at 29satnam@gmail.com.

    ]]>

item.title: Version 1.1.1 - Thanks for downloading NotchNest.
item.description:
Thanks for downloading NotchNest.

Here’s what’s new in Version 1.1.1:

  • Fixed an issue where enabling Glass Mode prevented the app from accessing the file tray.
  • Resolved a crash caused by image buildup in the pasteboard; the app now supports text-only pasteboard content.
  • Implemented an attempted fix for an issue where Sleep Mode could cause the app to become a zombie process.
  • Fixed Clear Glass UI interfering with drag detection, which broke file tray interaction.
  • Added German and Chinese localization.

    • Your support means a lot, and early feedback helps us improve faster.

    As always, if you run into any issues or have suggestions, feel free to reach out at 29satnam@gmail.com.

    ]]>

item.title: Version 1.0.11
item.description:
Thanks for downloading NotchNest.

Here's what's new in Version 1.0.11:

  • Fixed an issue where the previous update was accidentally released with placeholder album art.

    • Your support means a lot, and early feedback helps us improve faster.

    As always, if you run into any issues or have suggestions, feel free to reach out at 29satnam@gmail.com.

item.title: Version 1.0.10
item.description:
Thanks for downloading NotchNest.

Here's what's new in Version 1.0.10:

  • Improved screen detection for greater accuracy.
  • Added support for Liquid Glass user interface.
  • Fixed an issue where the 'Settings' button was unresponsive.

    • Your support means a lot, and early feedback helps us improve faster.

item.title: Version 1.0.0
item.description:
Welcome to NotchNest!

Initial release of NotchNest with the following features:

  • Calendar Integration
  • Quick Notes & Capture
  • Built-in Pomodoro Timer
  • Instant Bookmarks Access
  • Spotify & Music App Control
  • Instant Camera Mirror

    • Thank you for downloading NotchNest!
